snippet.title: The world's ten oldest jokes revealed
snippet.description: Aug 2, 2008 ... A gag about a woman breaking wind has been unveiled as the world's oldest witticism in a new University of Wolverhampton research project.

snippet.title: history - What is the "oldest joke in the book?" - English Language ...
snippet.description: Nov 22, 2013 ... Apparently, the oldest recorded joke in any form of English is about 1,000 years old, and is found in the Exeter Codex, written in Old English.
